forecast.day_comments: Isolated snow showers. The snow could be heavy at times.  Sunny, with a high near 31. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow showers before midnight, then a chance of snow showers after 1am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 11. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
